title: Ab Challenge
description: The ab workout challenge is all about getting a rock-hard core and six-pack. Include movements like crunches, sit-ups, leg raises, mountain climbers, and burpees.

title: Mindfullness Challenge
description: The mindfulness challenge promotes the practice of feeling present which can help to reduce stress, anxiety, and make you feel calmer. Include a mindfulness diary, guided meditation videos, and calming audio guidance.

title: Healthy Eating Challenge
description: This challenge aims to develop healthy lifestyle habits. While fitness can improve your physical health, nutrition also plays a big role in achieving your goals.

title: Squat Challenge
description: The squat challenge is ideal for your lower body. Members start by completing a certain number of reps in the first few days. This number gradually increases so that by the end of the 7 days members are doing more reps and are feeling the difference in their glutes.
